title: About
content: Founded in 2017, ChopStix is a New York-based technology company passionate about transforming local businesses and dedicated to enabling new ways of working, earning, and living. Today, ChopStix connects customers with more than 6000 of their favorite local and national restaurants across the United States and Canada. By building intelligent, last-mile delivery technology for local cities, ChopStix aims to connect people with the things they care about â€” one order at a time.
